entry.source: 〉 Someone--or someTHING--is hiding in{F801}the tall grass.{F801}

entry.source: Call out to it{F801}Walk away{F801}

entry.source: 〉 When {F843,0} calls out, Navarre{F801}appears from the grass.{F801}{F802}〉 It seems that life on the run has not{F801}treated him well. His dirty clothing is{F801}tattered and disheveled...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F87B,6,3,1,1}{F813,0,661000}Who are you? Are you an angel?{F801}Have you come to kill me!?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661001}{F87B,6,7,1,1}Demons, angels, Samurai...{F801}They're all trying to kill me.{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,11,1,1}{F813,0,661002}I'm tired of this. I've had enough{F801}of this world! Take me back to the{F801}world where there are no demons!{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,7,1,1}{F813,0,661003}I'm a Luxuror! You hear me!?{F801}A Luxuror!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F813,0,661009}Ah... Ahhh! Help me!{F801}I don't want to die!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661010}...Huh?{F801}O-Oh, it's just you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Navarre has joined you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Navarre has joined you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Heavenly voice\0{F87A,-21}{F813,0,661013}...Halt. Thou canst not deceive the{F801}eyes of an angel.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Heavenly voice\0{F87A,-21}{F813,0,661013}...Halt. Thou canst not deceive the{F801}eyes of an angel.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Angel\0{F87A,-20}{F813,0,661014}All those who are not part of the{F801}Lord's plan are destined for{F801}judgement.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661015}Judgement shall be rendered upon this{F801}one, in accordance with the Lord's{F801}will.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Angel\0{F87A,-20}{F813,0,661014}All those who are not part of the{F801}Lord's plan are destined for{F801}judgement.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661015}Judgement shall be rendered upon this{F801}one, in accordance with the Lord's{F801}will.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,0,661016}Oh, hello. I haven't seen him with{F801}you before. Did something happen?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,0,661016}Oh, hello. I haven't seen him with{F801}you before. Did something happen?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You explain Navarre's situation{F801}to Fujiwara.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You explain Navarre's situation{F801}to Fujiwara.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,1,1,1}{F813,0,661017}...I see. Well, if you survived an{F801}angel attack, you must be one lucky{F801}guy.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,1,1,1}{F813,0,661017}...I see. Well, if you survived an{F801}angel attack, you must be one lucky{F801}guy.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}I no longer have any place to call{F801}home. If I can, I would like to live{F801}here in Tokyo...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}I no longer have any place to call{F801}home. If I can, I would like to live{F801}here in Tokyo...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,1,1,1}{F813,0,661018}Well, all right. I'll make{F801}arrangements so that he can live here.{F801}{F802}{F87B,18,4,1,1}{F813,0,661019}Of course, he's more than welcome{F801}here. There aren't enough young people{F801}in Tokyo anymore.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661020}Since he was a Samurai, I'm sure he{F801}won't have a problem making a living{F801}as a Hunter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661021}I'll get him a smartphone so he can{F801}summon.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F87B,6,7,1,1}{F813,0,661022}Summon? Never! I've had enough.{F801}No more demons!{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,10,1,1}{F813,0,661023}I'm through with being a Samurai!{F801}I'm a Luxuror! A Luxuror!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F87B,6,7,1,1}{F813,0,661022}Summon? Never! I've had enough.{F801}No more demons!{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,10,1,1}{F813,0,661023}I'm through with being a Samurai!{F801}I'm a Luxuror! A Luxuror!{F801}

Okay...{F801}I guess he's had some bad experiences.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,661025}As long as you stay underground, the{F801}demons won't attack you. You should{F801}probably live there.{F801}{F802}{F87B,18,1,1,1}{F813,0,661026}I'm sure he'll feel better once he's{F801}settled down for a while. We've got{F801}time to figure out what to do.{F801}

Take care.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F87B,6,3,1,1}{F813,0,661004}How do you know my name?{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,7,1,1}{F813,0,661005}I've never met you...{F801}I don't remember...{F801}I don't want to remember!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F87B,6,3,1,1}{F813,0,661004}How do you know my name?{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,7,1,1}{F813,0,661005}I've never met you...{F801}I don't remember...{F801}I don't want to remember!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Navarre\0{F87A,134}{F87B,6,7,1,1}{F813,0,661011}What's wrong with you? You said you'd{F801}help me, but you're not protecting me{F801}at all, you hypocrite.{F801}{F802}{F87B,6,10,1,1}{F813,0,661012}Now, make sure to take me someplace{F801}where there are no demons!{F801}
